conclusion: Need to analyze the scene step by step to determine collisions and final stop position of A.

Several blocks scattered on green surface; colors include yellow, green, red, and orange. Some blocks are stacked, others are single.

A will likely hit the yellow block next to the orange one.

A will likely stop after colliding with multiple blocks; final position depends on sequence and intensity of collisions.
